title: Cannot send email via TBird. Get error 10060
content: I receive email fine. The website email works fine. I cannot send email via thunderbird and have not changed my settings which worked for years. my smtp account. I have rebooted my Windows 10 pc numerous times. What can do this? How can I fix this>
creator: jimblake

title: I cannot access my email. I have already donated to thunderbird and yet it still covers my screen. There seems to be no way to delete the message
content: Remove the thunderbird request for donation so I can access my email. I have donated to thunderbird today. Don't send me an email because I cannot access my email because your request covers the whole screen. Please call me at (360) 461-9702
creator: tibetans
